name: Monster Rush - Dash with the Cute Monster
name_original: Monster Rush - Dash with the Cute Monster
description:
Welcome to the new evolution of Monster Rush, Running with Joyride and Age of Zombies!!

Run like the wind, jump like a gazelle and avoid zombies like mad! This is lightning-fast action you won’t soon forget as our hero chases down hordes of monsters across two incredible worlds, normal-hopping and spook world!

How to Play:
- Tilt device to change the direction of our hero
- Do not collide with monsters and zombies!
- Collect GEMs, stars and other pickups as many as you can



With global online leaderboards, majestic medals and a new leveling system, this is the definitive version of Monster Rush and one of the greatest runner games ever made.
Do the Rush. Do the Monster Rush!
